scripts.db:docker: docker container run -d --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/data,target=/home,readonly -p 27017:27017 --name task7mongo --rm -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=task7 mongo:3.4.20-jessie && sleep 5
scripts.db:import: docker exec task7mongo mongoimport --authenticationDatabase admin --db task7 -u admin -p admin  --file /home/cities.json --mode=merge --drop --jsonArray
